Module FoundationsF25_2
Package entityClasses

Class Reply

java.lang.Object
entityClasses.Reply
public class Reply extends Object

Title: Reply Class

Description: Represents a reply to a forum post within the educational platform. Each Reply contains metadata including content, the author, and the post it belongs to. This class serves as a simple data model for CRUD operations and reporting.

Responsibilities:

  • Stores reply content and ownership details
  • Associates the reply with a specific post
  • Provides identifiers for database persistence

Note: Validation and permission checking must be enforced by higher layers.

Since:
2024-01-01
Version:
1.0
Author:
Educational Platform Development Team

  • Constructor Details

    • Reply

      public Reply()

      Method: Reply()

      Description: Default constructor. Intended for ORM or serialization use. Produces an incomplete Reply object.

    • Reply

      public Reply(String c, String o, int p)

      Method: Reply(String c, String o, int p)

      Description: Constructs a Reply object with all required fields populated.

      Parameters:
      c - the content of the reply (must not be null or empty)
      o - the username of the reply owner/author
      p - the ID of the post that this reply is associated with
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if required fields are null or invalid
